text: Somehow my drop down menu is stuck behind the hero section and I can't seem to be able bring it to the top. I know it is there just hidden any ideas would be appreciated. <https://www.pageonepower.com/link-building-service>. This page is built using a new theme I'm creating the rest of the site is based on a template we purchase a few years ago.
It’s not exactly “behind” the hero. You can either remove `overflow: hidden;` from `.header__container` or add `.header__container { overflow: initial; }`
